Package ca.corefacility.gview.layout.plot

Provides necessary code to draw out different types of plots on a GView map.

Class Summary
FeatureFilterMappable Wrapper around FeatureFilter.ByAnnotation which can be stored in a hash map.
PlotBuilder

PlotBuilderSymbols  
PlotDrawer Defines a way to draw different "styles" of plots.
PlotDrawerBar  
PlotDrawerCenter Draws out a plot with positive values colored above, negitive values colored below center line.

Package ca.corefacility.gview.layout.plot Description

Provides necessary code to draw out different types of plots on a GView map.
